translations.text: Say: "I seek refuge with (Allâh) the Lord of mankind,<sup foot_note=155075>1</sup>
"From the evil of the whisperer (devil who whispers evil in the hearts of men) who withdraws (from his whispering in one’s heart after one remembers Allâh).<sup foot_note=155077>1</sup>
"Who whispers in the breasts of mankind.

meta.translation_name: Muhammad Taqi-ud-Din al-Hilali & Muhammad Muhsin Khan
meta.author_name: Muhammad Taqi-ud-Din al-Hilali & Muhammad Muhsin Khan
